perturbation.original_text:
1.6 ACCOUNT SETTLEMENT.

               (a) PAYMENT INSTRUCTIONS. NPC shall prepare and transmit to          NCB, in a mutually acceptable format, instructions specifying the          payments to be made from the NCB Account to the Merchants and to NPC          pursuant to this Agreement (the "Payment Instructions"). Payment          Instructions shall be delivered to NCB in accordance with the schedule          and procedures established from time to time by the parties.

               (b) PAYMENT. In accordance with the Payment Instructions, NCB          shall pay the Merchants on a timely basis the net settlement amounts          due to them and shall credit NPC's account at NCB for the fees due to          NPC hereunder. Such payments to Merchants shall be effected through          mutually acceptable procedures which are consistent with the payment          procedures established pursuant to the Merchant Contracts. NPC shall          perform on NCB's behalf all of the administrative and bookkeeping          functions necessary to effect payment in such manner.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.6 ACCOUNT SETTLEMENT.

               (a) PAYMENT INSTRUCTIONS. NPC shall prepare and transmit to          NCB, in a mutually acceptable format, instructions specifying the          payments to be made from the NCB Account to the Merchants and to NPC          pursuant to this Agreement (the "Payment Instructions"). Payment          Instructions shall be delivered to NCB in accordance with the schedule          and procedures established from time to time by the parties.

               (b) PAYMENT. In accordance with the Payment Instructions, NCB          shall pay the Merchants within 10 business days of receiving payment instructions the net settlement amounts          due to them and shall credit NPC's account at NCB for the fees due to          NPC hereunder. Such payments to Merchants shall be effected through          mutually acceptable procedures which are consistent with the payment          procedures established pursuant to the Merchant Contracts. NPC shall          perform on NCB's behalf all of the administrative and bookkeeping          functions necessary to effect payment in such manner.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by specifying a payment timeframe of "within 10 business days", while the preceding sentence states payments will be made according to 'the schedule and procedures established from time to time by the parties'. The vagueness about payment timeframe will introduce a conflicting obligation, as one section mentions a definitive payment term and the other does not.

perturbation.original_text:
4.2 EXPENSES. NPC shall bear all expenses of maintaining facilities and connections necessary to provide Merchant Processing Services except for the facilities and connection maintained by NCB for purposes of effecting payments pursuant to Section 1.6(b). In addition, NPC agrees to pay or reimburse NCB in full all interchange or issuer reimbursement fees on outgoing



merchant sales volume, as well as all fee assessments or charges imposed on NCB by Visa or MasterCard as a result of the Merchant Processing Services performed by NPC. Such fees shall be paid by NPC directly when due or shall be paid by NPC to NCB on the banking day immediately prior to the day on which NCB must pay such fees. All such fees, assessments and charges for which NCB seeks payment by NPC shall, upon request, be documented to NPC's reasonable satisfaction as being attributable to NPC's Merchant Processing Services.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.2 EXPENSES. NPC shall bear all expenses of maintaining facilities and connections necessary to provide Merchant Processing Services except for the facilities and connection maintained by NCB for purposes of effecting payments pursuant to Section 1.6(b). In addition, NPC agrees to pay or reimburse NCB 50% of all interchange or issuer reimbursement fees on outgoing



merchant sales volume, as well as all fee assessments or charges imposed on NCB by Visa or MasterCard as a result of the Merchant Processing Services performed by NPC. Such fees shall be paid by NPC directly when due or shall be paid by NPC to NCB on the banking day immediately prior to the day on which NCB must pay such fees. All such fees, assessments and charges for which NCB seeks payment by NPC shall, upon request, be documented to NPC's reasonable satisfaction as being attributable to NPC's Merchant Processing Services.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a direct contradiction. The original clause states NPC is responsible for 'all' expenses, but the revision states NPC is responsible for only '50%' of fees. This creates ambiguity regarding the exact amount NPC is liable for, generating uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: 7.1 TERM. The term of this Agreement shall be five years commencing on the Effective Date and ending at the close of business on the fifth anniversary of the Effective Date. This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one-year terms unless one party gives the other party written notice of non-renewal at least six months prior to automatic renewal.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.1 TERM. The term of this Agreement shall be five years commencing on the Effective Date and ending at the close of business on the fifth anniversary of the Effective Date. This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one-year terms unless one party gives the other party written notice of non-renewal at least three months prior to automatic renewal.
perturbation.explanation: This creates an in-text contradiction related to renewal notice period. Originally six months' notice was needed to avoid renewal, but the modified term stipulates only three months. This causes uncertainty as to the actual required notice period, which introduces the inconsistencies requested.
